hero.subtitle: Your growth ambitions deserve strategic support at the highest level. We offer leading expertise in divestiture, acquisition and fundraising for SMEs and mid-caps.

provider.paragraph1: Your strategic decisions require more than simple support. At alecia, we stand by your side at every stage, with the same determination as an entrepreneur invested in their own success.
provider.paragraph2: Our dedicated partners lead your transactions with care, orchestrate the construction of key information, identify buyers, investors or lenders, and coordinate all advisors involved.

expertises.title: Our expertise
expertises.subtitle: Your projects deserve more than standard advice. Our partners combine deep experience in financial transactions and operations with an intimate understanding of entrepreneurial challenges.

cession.title: Divestiture & Succession
cession.description: Selling your business is a decisive moment that requires flawless preparation and execution.
cession.longDescription: Selling your business is a decisive moment, often the project of a lifetime, that requires flawless preparation and execution. We support you in securing the transaction, defending your interests and maximizing the value of your company, while ensuring its sustainability and respect for your employees.
cession.step1Desc: Realistic and transparent valuation of your business, implementation of a sales strategy, and preparation of documentation to the highest standards.
cession.step2Desc: Targeting and discreet approach of potential buyers through our extensive network.
cession.step3Desc: Assistance in all phases of negotiation through to completion of the sale.
cession.challenge2: Preparing documentation tailored to buyer expectations
cession.challenge3: Optimizing valuation, negotiating and making your terms heard

fundraising.title: Fundraising & Financing
fundraising.description: Whether to finance your growth or restructure your capital, we support you.
fundraising.longDescription: Whether to finance your growth, invest in new projects, restructure your capital or realize your wealth, we offer expert fundraising advice perfectly tailored to your specific needs and development strategy.
fundraising.step1Desc: Developing innovative strategies using dilutive or non-dilutive instruments.
fundraising.step2Desc: We cultivate a vast network of investors and financial institutions.
fundraising.step3Desc: Assistance in structuring deals and negotiating the best terms.
fundraising.challenge1: Identifying the best combination of funding sources from the wide range of investors and lenders
fundraising.challenge2: Understanding your strategy and challenges, preparing compelling documentation and presenting it to the right parties
fundraising.challenge3: Negotiating favorable financial and governance terms, perfectly aligned with your development strategy

acquisition.title: Acquisition
acquisition.description: Acquiring a company is a major strategic lever to accelerate growth.
acquisition.longDescription: Acquiring a company is a major strategic lever to accelerate your company's growth. We guide you through this complex process with proven expertise and methodology, ensuring successful integration and maximum value creation.
acquisition.step1Desc: Precise identification of targets, evaluation of their value and strategic fit.
acquisition.step2Desc: Support in negotiations to optimize financial terms.
acquisition.step3Desc: Strategic advice for smooth and effective integration.
acquisition.challenge1: Saving you valuable time on identifying and approaching relevant targets
acquisition.challenge2: Negotiating price, terms and guarantees to control risks related to valuation and integration
acquisition.challenge3: Orchestrating thorough due diligence and guiding your advisors to anticipate integration challenges

regional.subtitle: Our strong regional roots and backgrounds combining entrepreneurial experience with M&A advisory enable us to understand the challenges and daily reality of business leaders.

valuation.description: Get a free initial estimate based on your sector multiples. Our tool uses comparable transaction data to give you an order of magnitude.

team.subtitle: Our strength lies in the diversity of our backgrounds and sector expertise
team.hiringSubtitle: Join a dynamic team and participate in exciting transactions.

dedicatedApproach.title: Two partners dedicated to each assignment
dedicatedApproach.description: Your projects deserve top-level support. That's why two experienced partners are dedicated to each assignment, ensuring specialized expertise and constant responsiveness to transform your objectives into success. At alecia, our multi-specialist team understands the challenges specific to each sector. We precisely assess the feasibility of your projects and activate the most relevant levers to optimize each stage of their realization.

contact.subtitle: Are you a business owner, shareholder, or investor? Contact us for information about our services.

careers.title: Join the alecia adventure
careers.subtitle: Our strength lies in our talent and how we operate. We place paramount importance on attracting, developing and retaining collaborators most compatible with our mindset and ambitions. Joining us means fully embracing a team that values excellence, respect and continuous improvement, working in a stimulating and supportive environment.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.p1: We are proud to operate in the regions and bring our expertise to local ecosystems.
vision.p2: Our professional standards drive us to continuously improve our approach and commitment to French SMEs and mid-caps.
vision.p3: This fusion of cutting-edge expertise with a decentralized approach allows our teams to benefit from training and professional practice to the highest standards, while enjoying a serene quality of life.
vision.p4: We also offer experienced profiles the opportunity to open new offices and take on the mission of making alecia shine close to our territories.

invest.title: Investing in your future
invest.p1: We are committed to investing in our employees' development through tailored training programs, mentoring opportunities, and a culture of excellence centered on continuous improvement.
invest.p2: At alecia, every team member is encouraged to innovate and actively contribute to our common mission. We seek collaborators driven by the desire to learn and progress, and we value the diversity of talents and perspectives, ensuring every voice is heard and every idea has the opportunity to flourish.

values.teamworkDesc: Close collaboration between partners and analysts on every project.
values.balanceDesc: A respected work-life balance and modern offices.

spontaneous.title: Spontaneous application
spontaneous.subtitle: No opening matches your profile? Send us your spontaneous application, we are always looking for new talent.

faq.sectorMultiples: What are the valuation multiples in this sector?
faq.sectorMultiplesAnswer: Multiples vary according to the size, profitability and growth prospects of the company. Contact us for a personalized analysis of your situation.
faq.transactionDuration: What is the average duration of a divestiture transaction?
faq.transactionDurationAnswer: A divestiture transaction generally takes between 6 and 12 months, depending on the complexity of the file and market conditions.
faq.acquisitionSupportAnswer: Yes, we support both sellers and buyers in their external growth projects, whether for single acquisitions or build-up strategies.

homeFaq.title: FAQ
homeFaq.subtitle: Answers to all your questions
homeFaq.ctaSubtitle: Contact one of our partners for more information

services.question: What services does alecia offer?
services.answer: alecia is an M&A advisory firm, also known as a merger and acquisition advisor. We offer a range of specialized services for businesses, including divestiture, acquisition, merger, financing and fundraising. Thanks to our sector expertise and extensive networks, we support business owners and shareholders in identifying relevant counterparties (buyers, investors, lenders or acquisition targets), producing valuations and key information, negotiating terms and coordinating legal and tax advisors through to the successful completion of the transaction.

differentiation.question: How does alecia differentiate from other financial advisors?
differentiation.answer: alecia stands out in several ways. First, we take an inter-professional approach by forming an integrated team of your various advisors (accountant, specialized lawyers in business and tax law, wealth managers, etc.) from the start of the transaction. We also guarantee the continuous involvement of two experienced partners throughout the assignment, ensuring constant expertise and responsiveness. Our entrepreneurial backgrounds allow us to intimately understand the daily life of business owners, adding valuable perspective to our support. Finally, our expertise in financial engineering and our multi-sector dimension enable us to build solutions tailored to each situation.

sectors.question: Do you specialize in a particular sector?
sectors.answer: We combine the experiences of our partners to provide multi-sector expertise and deep knowledge of their ecosystems. We operate in the following areas: agri-food, distribution and consumer and business services, real estate and construction, industries, healthcare, financial services and insurance, technology and software, as well as companies with environmental and/or social impact.

fees.question: How are your fees calculated?
fees.answer: Our remuneration is divided into two parts. First, initial fees are paid upon signing a mandate. Their amount is limited and serves to formalize our mutual commitment to the transaction. Then, the vast majority of our remuneration comes from success fees, calculated by applying a percentage to the transaction amount. This model ensures alignment of our interests with yours and guarantees our commitment throughout the assignment. The only exception concerns acquisition mandates, where success fees are based on the size of the target rather than the transaction amount, to maintain this alignment of interests.

meaning.question: What does alecia mean?
meaning.answer: alecia derives from the concept of aletheia, which embodies the notion of truth and reality. This name guides our approach based on three guiding principles: honesty, excellence and humility. These values drive us to be transparent in all our interactions and to commit to continuous improvement of our expertise and tools.
